TOOLTIP.NETWORK: "Network" is your network of friends, colleagues, and other personal contacts that help and support you. In the field, enter in a score between 1 and 5 to represent the state of your network: 1 is considered to be a poor network, whereas 5 is a very strong network.

TOOLTIP.PRIMARY_HEALTH_CARE_PROVIDER: Your primary health care provider is the medical professional that you see regularly, and whom you consider to know your medical record the best.
TOOLTIP.PRIMARY_CARER: Your primary carer is the person who primarily cares and supports you during difficult periods.

CONFIRM_EMAIL.TITLE: E-mail validation
CONFIRM_EMAIL.TEXT: In order to continue your sign-up process, you need to validate your e-mail address. Please follow the link we have sent to your inbox.

DOWNLOAD.TEXT_NOT_CLINICIAN: You have now completed the introduction. All that is left is to download the app on your phone.
DOWNLOAD.TEXT_CLINICIAN: You have now completed the introduction. All that is left is to log into the

INVALID_TOKEN.TITLE: An error has occurred.
INVALID_TOKEN.TEXT: Your link has expired or your account is already validated.
INVALID_TOKEN.CHECK_INBOX: Please check your inbox for more details.

LEGAL_GENERAL.AGREE_TOS: I have read and agree to the End-User Terms of Use
LEGAL_GENERAL.Comments: Do not translate the term 'End-User Terms of Use'

LEGAL_USER.AGREE_EULA: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy
LEGAL_USER.Comments: Do not translate the term 'Privacy Policy'

LEGAL_INTENT.AGREE_IU: I have read and agree to the Intended Use

SET_PASSWORD.MIN_LENGTH: Please choose a password for your account. The password must be at least 8 characters long.

ERROR.TITLE: An error has occurred.
ERROR.TEXT: Your link has expired or your account is already validated.
ERROR.CHECK_INBOX: Please check your inbox for more details.

WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome!
WELCOME.TEXT: Your account has now been successfully created.
WELCOME.INTRODUCTION_TEXT: In order to gain more insights into the use of the solution, we have prepared a short introduction for you.

VERIFICATION_COMPLETE.MESSAGE: You can now leave this page and proceed to login.
